Reviews.Title: Lasted 5 minutes
Reviews.Author: E. A. Montgomery
Reviews.Content: While my experience with the Pentax Optio WG-2 Digital Camera, Vermillion Red was excellent (ending only when I left it on the beach) my experience with the WG-10 was a different story. When I took a few test shots indoors the picture quality was very low. I decided to test it in the pool and the camera lasted less than five minutes. Three shots in I noticed there was fogging on the LCD. Water had definitely infiltrated the camera, as the SD card was soaked and the unit no longer functioned. This may be a quality control issue, but it was one I'd rather not repeat.
